title: Exquisite Polki and Ruby Floral Jhumka
features: This unique jhumka features a modern geometric top with a stunning polki diamond at the center, surrounded by pave-set diamonds. The bottom showcases a floral motif with a vibrant cabochon ruby at its core, encircled by smaller round brilliant cut diamonds. The design beautifully blends traditional polki craftsmanship with a contemporary silhouette.
occasions: or adding a touch of elegance to festive occasions. Can also be worn for modern adaptations of traditional events like Sangeeth or Mehndi.
description: This jhumka is a testament to the enduring appeal of polki diamonds, enhanced by a contemporary design. The Hyderabadi polish adds a rich luster to the gold, while the vibrant ruby and sparkling diamonds create a captivating contrast. A rare blend of tradition and modernity, this piece is sure to turn heads.
